ledgerEntries: You wake up after a snooze.

room.title: A Dusty Attic
room.subtitle: This cramped space offers little comfort. Some more text.
room.description: Roughly seven feet square, the walls seem like they're closing in on you. A gas lamp flickers weakly and sheds a meagre light on the dirty walls. A small, grimy window is almost too dirty to look through, but the outline of the factory outside is just visible.
